mapper.select: SELECT m.mac_no macNo, m.mac_name macName, concat_ws("/", m.mac_no, m.mac_name) macMsg, m.mac_type macType, m.mac_status macStatus, m.spec spec, c.org_name orgName FROM mes_jingcai.machine_set_mes m LEFT JOIN hcm.cas_org c ON c.id = m.org_id AND c.company_id = m.company_id AND c.deleted = 'F' WHERE m.crafwork_id = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND m.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND m.deleted = 'F'
